KG Reddy College of Engineering & Technology (KGRCET) was established in 2008. It is a private autonomous engineering college located near Moinabad/Chilkur in Hyderabad. The college offers undergraduate (B.Tech) and postgraduate (M.Tech, MBA, MCA) programs with industry-facing labs, digital classrooms, placement support, hostels, and transport facilities.
KG Reddy College of Engineering & Technology (KGRCET) can be contacted at: Phone: +91 90006 33008, Email: info@kgr.ac.in, Website: kgr.ac.in
KG Reddy College is located at: Chilkur Village, Moinabad Mandal, Ranga Reddy District, Telangana - 501504 (near Moinabad Police Station).

KG Reddy College is affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Hyderabad (JNTUH) and operates as an autonomous institution with UGC autonomous status. The college is AICTE-approved and NAAC accredited. Several departments also have NBA accreditation.

KG Reddy College offers: Undergraduate B.Tech programs in CSE (including AI/ML and Data Science specializations), ECE, EEE, Mechanical Engineering, and Civil Engineering. Postgraduate programs include M.Tech specializations, MBA, and MCA. Please visit the college website for the latest intake details.

KG Reddy College offers B.Tech programs in: Computer Science & Engineering (CSE), CSE with AI/ML, CSE with Data Science, Electronics & Communication Engineering (ECE), Electrical & Electronics Engineering (EEE), Mechanical Engineering, and Civil Engineering. Typical intake varies by program, with CSE having around 300 seats, CSE-Data Science 60 seats, ECE 60 seats, Mechanical 30 seats, and Civil 30 seats.
KG Reddy College offers postgraduate programs including M.Tech specializations (in CSE, VLSI, etc.), MBA, and MCA. Program availability and seat counts are listed on the college website.

For B.Tech admissions at KG Reddy College: Students typically enter through state entrance rank/seat allocation (TS-EAMCET or state counselling) or management quota. The EAMCET Code for KGRCET is KGRH. For M.Tech: Admissions are generally via GATE/PGECET/university counselling. For MBA/MCA: Admissions are through TS ICET or university counselling.

At KG Reddy College, fee structures vary by course and category. B.Tech yearly fees range approximately from Rs.90,000 to Rs.1,03,000 (varies by branch and year). PG/MBA/MCA fees also vary (example: MCA around Rs.90,000 total). For exact and current fee details, please visit the official fees/finance page on the college website.

KG Reddy College has a strong placement record. Recent placement statistics show highest package figures reaching up to Rs.16 LPA in some years. Average packages typically range between Rs.4-7 LPA depending on the year and branch. The college hosts a variety of recruiters. For the most current placement information, please refer to the placement page on the college website.

KG Reddy College offers comprehensive facilities including: A large central library (~7,480 sq ft) with 25,700+ volumes and access to thousands of e-journals/e-books, boys' hostel on campus and girls' hostel in Mehdipatnam, college bus transport with city pick-up points, department labs, digital classrooms, Wi-Fi campus, sports facilities, cafeteria, gym, and auditorium.
KG Reddy College has a large central library spanning approximately 7,480 sq ft. It houses over 25,700 volumes and provides access to thousands of e-journals and e-books for students and faculty.

KG Reddy College provides hostel facilities for students. There is a boys' hostel located on campus, while the girls' hostel is situated in Mehdipatnam. For details about hostel fees and amenities, please check the college website or contact the administration.

KG Reddy College provides transport facilities with college buses operating on various routes with city pick-up points. For specific route details and pick-up points, please refer to the transport page on the college website.

KG Reddy College has several departments including: CSE, CSE (AI/ML), CSE (Data Science), ECE, EEE, Mechanical, Civil, MBA (Business Administration), and Humanities & Sciences. The college also has an Institution Innovation Cell, incubation/entrepreneur support, and research/industry cells.

Student life at KG Reddy College is vibrant with annual technical and cultural fests (such as IKARUS, IGNUS, and INVICTA), student council activities, sports events, technical clubs, and participation in IIC & incubation programs.

KG Reddy College provides various documents including prospectus & brochure, course syllabus, exam timetables, fee payment forms, hostel forms, and transcript/duplicate memo forms. These are available on the college website under 'Downloads/Student Corner/Examination' pages.
For B.Tech admission at KG Reddy College, you need 10+2 with PCM + TS EAMCET / state counselling OR meet management quota rules. The EAMCET code for KGRCET is KGRH.
